biotools.summary: Neural network-based method, trained and tested on a set of experimentally derived signal peptides from eukaryotes and prokaryotes, that identifies the presence of sorting signals and predicts their cleavage sites.

bioschemas.name: SPEPLip
bioschemas.summary: Neural network-based method, trained and tested on a set of experimentally derived signal peptides from eukaryotes and prokaryotes, that identifies the presence of sorting signals and predicts their cleavage sites.
